price: তুমি সিহঁতক সতৰ্ক কৰা বা নকৰা, সিহঁতৰ বাবে উভয়ে সমান; সিহঁতে ঈমান পোষণ নকৰিব।
arabic: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَنذَرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُنذِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wasawāon ʿalayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhir'hum lā yu'minūna
